SEARCH
Package control

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
control.BaseController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthenticationController, CareerCenterStaffController, CompanyRepresentativeController, StudentController
public abstract class BaseController extends Object
Base controller that provides common CSV read/write utilities and helpers used by other controllers.

Subclasses use these protected methods to load and persist domain objects.

  • Method Details

    • escapeCSV

      protected String escapeCSV(String s)
      Escape and quote a string for safe CSV output.
      Parameters:
      s - original string (may be null)
      Returns:
      a CSV-safe string (quotes doubled and field quoted when necessary)

    • unquote

      protected String unquote(String s)
      Remove surrounding CSV quotes and unescape doubled quotes.
      Parameters:
      s - field value from CSV
      Returns:
      unquoted/unescaped string

    • loadStudents

      protected Map<String,Student> loadStudents(Path csvPath)
      Load students from the given CSV path into a map keyed by student id.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the student CSV file
      Returns:
      map of student id -> Student or null on read error

    • loadStaffs

      protected Map<String,CareerCenterStaff> loadStaffs(Path csvPath)
      Load career centre staff entries from CSV into a map keyed by staff id.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the staff CSV file
      Returns:
      map of staff id -> CareerCenterStaff or null on error

    • loadCompanyReps

      protected Map<String,CompanyRepresentative> loadCompanyReps(Path csvPath)
      Load company representatives from CSV into a map keyed by representative id/email.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the company representative CSV file
      Returns:
      map of companyRep id/email -> CompanyRepresentative or null on error

    • loadInternships

      protected Map<String,Internship> loadInternships(Path csvPath)
      Load internships from CSV into a map keyed by UUID string.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the internship CSV
      Returns:
      map of uuid -> Internship or null on error

    • loadApplications

      protected Map<String,List<Application>> loadApplications(Path csvPath)
      Load applications grouped by internship UUID into a map.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the application CSV
      Returns:
      map of internship UUID -> list of Application objects or null on error

    • loadWithdrawals

      protected Map<String,List<Withdrawal>> loadWithdrawals(Path csvPath)
      Load withdrawal requests grouped by internship UUID into a map.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the withdrawal CSV
      Returns:
      map of internship UUID -> list of Withdrawal objects or null on error

    • rewriteStudentCSV

      protected boolean rewriteStudentCSV(Path csvPath, Map<String,Student> students)
      Persist the provided students map to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to write
      students - map of student id -> Student
      Returns:
      true when write succeeds, false on error

    • rewriteStaffCSV

      protected boolean rewriteStaffCSV(Path csvPath, Map<String,CareerCenterStaff> staffs)
      Persist staff entries to CSV.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to write
      staffs - map of staff id -> CareerCenterStaff
      Returns:
      true when write succeeds

    • rewriteCompanyRepCSV

      protected boolean rewriteCompanyRepCSV(Path csvPath, Map<String,CompanyRepresentative> companyReps)
      Persist company representatives to CSV.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to write
      companyReps - map of id -> CompanyRepresentative
      Returns:
      true on success

    • rewriteInternshipCSV

      protected boolean rewriteInternshipCSV(Path csvPath, Map<String,Internship> internships)
      Persist internships map to CSV.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to write
      internships - map of uuid -> Internship
      Returns:
      true on success

      Persist application lists grouped by internship to CSV.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to write
      applications - map of internship uuid -> list of Application
      Returns:
      true on success

      withdrawals - map of internship uuid -> list of Withdrawal
